ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Rules and FAQ 3.2 - PLEASE READ THIS!
ygData.msgSnippet: Lyran s Mystical Lute is slightly better than Kelin s, maybe 34% or so. Lute of the Howler is slightly worse than Kelin s, so maybe 28% or so. ... They are
ygData.messageBody:
Lyran's Mystical Lute is slightly better than Kelin's, maybe 34% or so.
Lute of the Howler is slightly worse than Kelin's, so maybe 28% or so.

> Anyone know what colour(s) the Melodic, Resonant and
> Troubador armours are?

They are different on each race, so it's hard to say. Resonant (Thurgadin
quest) is a deep blue, Troubador (Kael quest) is a deep red, Twilight
(Skyshrine quest) is a flat gray.

> I'd also like to add a "difficulty rating" for each...

Imbrued: 46+
Melodic: 50+
Resonant: 50+
Twilight: 55+
Troubador: 55+

Shada Iceheart [Retired]
<Afterlife>
